app.name: Triinux
app.long_description:
Put any ppcboot.elf in the same folder on SD and this should load it. if not run from SD, it will look for SD:/bootmii/ppcboot.elf For the record, Joostin didn't want to change the name to Triinux.
Arguments: bootmii= use BootMii IOS (defaults to 1) debug= show debug output (defaut's to 0) path= for a custom path to the ppcboot.elf file on SD. E.G. path=/apps/triinux/ppcboot.elf
